title: Terms and Conditions
subtitle: Please read these terms and conditions carefully before using the app.
welcome: Welcome to Investor! By using this app, you agree to these terms and conditions. Please read them carefully before proceeding.

section1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
section1.content: By registering or using Investor, you agree to comply with these terms. If you do not agree, please do not use the app.

section2.title: 2. Personal Accounts
items: Users must provide accurate information during registration.
Users are responsible for maintaining the security of their account.
We reserve the right to suspend or close accounts in case of misuse.

section3.title: 3. Reward Points and Point-Back
items: Points are earned based on qualifying purchases.
Points can be redeemed for discounts on future purchases or sent as gifts.
Point rates and rewards may vary based on offers and membership level.
Unused points may expire after a specified period.

section4.title: 4. Membership Levels
items: Membership level depends on your purchase activity.
Higher membership levels offer increased reward rates and discounts.
Program misuse may result in account suspension.

section5.title: 5. Payment and Transactions
items: Payments are processed securely through our partners.
Investor is not responsible for any issues related to external payment providers.

section6.title: 6. Restrictions and Prohibited Activities
section6.subtitle: Users are prohibited from:
items: Attempting to hack or disrupt app services.

section7.title: 7. Terms Modifications
section7.content: We may update these terms at any time. Continued use of the app means acceptance of the modified terms.

section8.title: 8. Limitation of Liability
section8.content: Investor does not assume any responsibility for any losses or damages resulting from the use of the app.
